definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Another marcher switched targets when it was his turn at the bullhorn.
sentences.chinese: 轮到另一名游行者使用扩音器时，他转换了目标。

sentences.english: He gave a tap at the microphone before speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他在讲话前先轻叩了一下扩音器。

sentences.english: Just use a wired headset or the speakerphone function,” she said.
sentences.chinese: 使用有线耳机或扩音器功能，就能达到预防目的。

sentences.english: This port connects to the side speakers in an 8-channel audio configuration.
sentences.chinese: 该端口连接到位于两边的扩音器在8声道音频配置。

sentences.english: Use drums and gongs , megaphones and recorders to help.
sentences.chinese: 用锣鼓，扩音器和录音机帮忙。

sentences.english: The woofer's magnet is at least twice as big as those used in ordinary active subwoofers.
sentences.chinese: 这个低音扩音器的磁铁至少是普通喇叭的两倍大。

sentences.english: She said over the loudspeaker. They high-fived each other and left the office.
sentences.chinese: 她对着扩音器说完就离开了办公室。

sentences.english: The two big grilles each side of the keyboard suggest a generous loudspeaker provision.
sentences.chinese: 键盘两侧各有一个铁栅栏，栅栏下面就是扩音器。

sentences.english: The job of getting a character to say something through the loudspeakers or headphones is given to the producer.
sentences.chinese: 让人物通过扩音器或耳麦说话的工作由制作器负责。

sentences.english: "Stop, " Rescorla ordered through the bullhorn. "Be still.
sentences.chinese: 不要动，“瑞斯寇拉透过扩音器指挥。

sentences.english: Would you like a streamer and amplifier?
sentences.chinese: 你们要横幅和扩音器吗？

sentences.english: My arrest can be announced publicly from loudspeakers on top of a car.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以用车顶上的扩音器公开宣布我的逮捕。

sentences.english: The audio interface must support your amplifier and speaker setup.
sentences.chinese: 音频接口必须支持您的扩音器和扬声器设置。

sentences.english: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the Tannoy .
sentences.chinese: 车站工作人员通过扩音器广播了火车进站的消息。

sentences.english: The rich value personal networks more than online megaphones.
sentences.chinese: 相比网络扩音器，有钱人更看重个人网络。

sentences.english: Back on board Phil tells me I am being called over the tannoy.
sentences.chinese: 回到车上，菲尔告诉我有扩音器在叫我。
